record.id: field.name="values" and file.name="operator" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: values
record.file.name: operator

brief.brief: Values passed into the application through the parameter names.
The value helps identify what appears when a user starts a session. It can be either a menu name or a form name, depending on the parameter.
If the Parameter Value field is blank, the default is Main Menu, and at logon, Service Manager displays the System Administrator's home menu.
To send a user to a different menu, you can specify menu.manager as the name of the initial application to run and enter an existing menu name as the parameter value.
